case.title: Cute minx seeks intelligent, paternal lover - 27 (London)
case.text:
I am the girl-next-door, but with added impishness. Relish dynamic conversation and new exciting experiences; if you can teach me/ show me new ways of looking at the world, I am far more likely to be captivated!
Submissive in the bedroom, with a need for regular spankings from Daddy to make sure I don't become too cheeky ;)
If this catches your interest, do message with something that you feel will make me respond :)
